name: kite-kubernetes
description: Kite is a self hosted knowledge base and note taking platform. It supports markdown, hierarchical organization and search, providing a simple way to document processes, ideas or internal documentation for teams.

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Write documentation in markdown with syntax highlighting. Create rich content easily

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Organize pages in nested folders and categories. Structure knowledge logically

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Fast search across all documentation content. Find information quickly

features.title: Version History
features.description: Track changes to pages with complete revision history. See how documentation evolves

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Team collaboration with user accounts and permissions. Build knowledge together

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Control who can view and edit specific pages. Secure sensitive documentation

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload files and images to documentation pages. Keep related resources together
